content: He'll often vary this combo up making it hard to read, and either trick you into thinking he's preparing a cast before tail-whipping, or throwing more quick slashes in-between tail attacks -- or even just doing single hits.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Chen Loong'.
The content is as follows:
He'll often vary this combo up making it hard to read, and either trick you into thinking he's preparing a cast before tail-whipping, or throwing more quick slashes in-between tail attacks -- or even just doing single hits.
